thread.title: Chris Rock to host 2016 Oscar broadcast - Western Telegraph
thread.title_full: Chris Rock to host 2016 Oscar broadcast - Western Telegraph - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Western Telegraph
title: Chris Rock to host 2016 Oscar broadcast - Western Telegraph
text:
The show's producers David Hill and Reginald Hudlin have said the funnyman will take the duties for the 88th Academy Awards on February 28, 2016. Chris, who previously hosted the Oscars ceremony in 2005 and presented an award at the 2012 event, said: "I'm so glad to be hosting the Oscars.
 Western Telegraph.
